name: In Space, Out Of Time
description:
In Space, Out Of Time Created for the 'Genre Mash' Game Jam! An 'Action Space Shooter / Bullet-Hell' mashed with a 'Turn-based RPG'. Theme: 're-use' - re-use the destroyed enemies as bullet shields! Controls: use mouse curser to direct your ship. Right mouse button to thrust, left mouse button to fire lasers. First level is a practice level (static enemies) so take time to get used to the controls.  Difficulty note: the game gets quite hard if you tech into bullets too early! 

Credits:

Sound effects: Viktor.Hahn@web.de, Kenney.nl

Music: FoxSynergy

Background Nebula: www.GodsAndIdols.com
